overview:
Josh is currently Vice President at Jivaro, a Recruiting Firm based in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Josh has been involved in headhunting since he co-founded Jivaro as the head of its Client Research Division in 1997. In addition to his day-to-day headhunting responsibilities, he also manages multiple teams of recruiters that focus on high tech placements and handles operations for Jivaroâ€™s 4 regional offices.

Josh has forged strong relationships with several top tier venture capital firms over the years. While his focus is on assisting them staff executive positions at their portfolio companies, he has also helped many startup companies obtain funding through his VC relationships.

With a focus and passion for early stage start-ups, Josh has worked to bridge the gap between ‘cutting edge companies - looking for top talent’ and ‘top talent - looking for cutting edge companies’….
